mapper.select: /* AdmMhdlgAplyMapper.selectMhdlgAplyListCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1
/* AdmMhdlgAplyMapper.selectMhdlgAplyList */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
/* AdmMhdlgAplyMapper.selectMhdlgAplyHistList */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
/* AdmMhdlgAplyMapper.selectMhdlgAplyExcel */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
